title: Waiting for Child Process Completion
description: In this lab, you can learn how to wait for a process::Child to finish by calling Child::wait, which will return a process::ExitStatus.

meta.title: Waiting for Child Process Completion in Rust
meta.description: Learn how to wait for a Rust process::Child to finish using Child::wait and retrieve the ExitStatus.
meta.keywords: rust playground, exitstatus, process, child process, rust tutor, rust online compiler, rust commands, wait, rust practice, rust online
